targets.query: SELECT (SUM("retweets") + SUM("favorites")) / LAST("tweets") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("retweet_count")) AS "retweets", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("favorite_count")) AS "favorites", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("user_statuses_count")) AS "tweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum("engagement_count") AS "Engagements" FROM (SELECT  non_negative_derivative(max("retweet_count"))+ non_negative_derivative(max("favorite_count")) AS "engagement_count" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("retweets") AS "sum_retweets" FROM (SELECT last("retweet_count") AS "retweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "id_str")

SELECT sum("retweets") AS "Retweets" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("retweet_count")) AS "retweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("favorites") AS "Likes" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("favorite_count")) AS "favorites" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT sum("retweets") AS "sum_retweets" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("retweet_count")) AS "retweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT sum("favorites") AS "sum_favorites" FROM (SELECT  non_negative_derivative(max("favorite_count")) AS "favorites" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT (SUM("retweets") + SUM("favorites")) / LAST("tweets") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("retweet_count")) AS "retweets", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("favorite_count")) AS "favorites", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("user_statuses_count")) AS "tweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT (SUM("retweets") + SUM("favorites")) / LAST("tweets") FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("retweet_count")) AS "retweets", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("favorite_count")) AS "favorites", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("user_statuses_count")) AS "tweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT SUM("retweets") / LAST("tweets") AS "Retweets Rate" FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("retweet_count")) AS "retweets", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("user_statuses_count")) AS "tweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ( "retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

SELECT SUM("favorites") / LAST("tweets") AS "Favorites Rate" FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(MAX("favorite_count")) AS "favorites", NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(LAST("user_statuses_count")) AS "tweets" FROM "twitter" WHERE ( "retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "id_str") GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT sum("favorites") AS "sum_favorites" FROM (SELECT last("favorite_count") AS "favorites" FROM "twitter" WHERE ( "retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "id_str")

SELECT sum("retweets") + sum("favorites") AS "Engagements" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("retweet_count")) AS "retweets", non_negative_derivative(max("favorite_count")) AS "favorites" FROM "twitter" WHERE ("retweeted" = 'false') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "id_str") GROUP BY time(1h)
